data.title: Sue Terry Voices
data.meta_description: Recognisable, grounded with a dry wit and impeccable comic timing.   Award winning, respected stand-up comedian, actor & writer.  Grew up in Shropshire....
data.text:
Recognisable, grounded with a dry wit and impeccable comic timing.

Award winning, respected stand-up comedian, actor & writer.

Grew up in Shropshire.

Greg is the host of BAFTA-winning hit TV show Taskmaster. He is also the writer and star of critically lauded Man Down, as well as the creator, writer and star ofThe Cleaner. He is also well known for playing ruthless Head of Sixth Form, Mr Gilbert, in the comedy series The Inbetweeners.

BAFTA nomination for Best Male Performance in a Comedy Programme for BBC Three's Cuckoo.
